text: Peter Zobl-Wessely (born 12 July 1949) is an Austrian modern pentathlete and fencer. He competed as a modern pentathlete at the 1972 Summer Olympics and as a fencer at the 1976 Summer Olympics. == References == Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian male fencers Category:Austrian épée fencers Category:Austrian male modern pentathletes Category:Olympic fencers of Austria Category:Olympic modern pentathletes of Austria Category:Modern pentathletes at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:People from Mistelbach Category:Sportspeople from Lower Austria
title: Peter Zobl-Wessely
